Играл в восьмой раз, а ощущения как впервые. Головоломки - достойные, сюжет - достойный. Советую поиграть в DLC (а именно Portal Stories:Mel и Portal:Reloated). Очень понравилось покупкой доволен.

전작도 명작이지만 이번 포탈2도 충분히 명작소리를 듣고 있는 수작. 제발 3좀 나왔으면 좋겠음. 스토리는 명작이라는 소리를 들을만큼 좋을수밖에 없음.
Топ игра, хватит где-то на 7 вечерков, а елси брать на распродаже, так вообще имба

Kendi fikirlerimi söylüyorum şuan bu oyunun hikayesi oynanışı bulmacaları çok iyi fakat beyin gerekiyor. Co-op oynayacaksanız daha çok bence ama oyunun güzel kısmı mesela geçemedin uğraştın uğraştın normalde oyundan alt f4 atıp çıkarsınız ve bir kaç gün sonra geri girebilirsiniz. İnternetten bakıp geçebilirsiniz ve sonraki bulmacalarda daha çok eğlenebilirsiniz. İlk oyunu oynadım çok kalitesiz buna nazaran ve oyunu oynamak için mükemmel bir pc'ye de gerek yok. Bütün saydığım bu nedenler bu oyunu güzel yapıyor.
Best game you'll ever play. A companion is recommended.

It's hard to overstate my satisfaction.

Portal 2 is the quintessential co-op experience. Everything about it is the definition of team-oriented, from challenging puzzles to timing your jumps, this game will force you to work with your partner to overcome all obstacles. An absolute blast from beginning to end. 9/10

I cant believe it my friend was obsessed for thios game that I had to play and you know what it was hard I got very confused because I saw PORTAL s in places and I didnt know how to shoot TWO portals and I wasnt sure ifd I should be FANBOY some times it takes some WORK and since I am a BOY it was so good I had to play in school. I wouldnt recomend being on any DRUGS playing this because I dont think it would change this game for the better. I was platying this game and saw something very cool but it was good that I RECOREDED IT. I couldnt bellieve that someone said this was a guy only game its very sexist even though IM A GUY. SOme people call me PIZZA because I own a bakery and play this there. The bottom line is taht I would play this when I would take a mental health day from school and I LIKE IT. My mom said if I play  this TOO MUCH THOUGH i CANT GO TYRICK OR TREATING THIS YEAR, but she just wants ATTENTION
